response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a price of $950,000 for this transaction. I am confident that this offer strikes a balance between the perceived value of the product to you and the investment I have made into it. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
